text: Ara tomadera ki hayeche ye, yate allahara nama neya hayeche tomara ta theke khabe na? Ya tomadera jan'ya tini harama karechena ta tini bisadabhabe'i tomadera kache bibrta karechena [1], tabe tomara nirupaya hale ta sbatantra [2]. Ara nisciya aneke ajnatabasata nijedera kheyala â€“khusi dbara an'yake bipadgami kare; niscaya apanara raba simalanghanakaridera sambad'dhe adhika janena
